alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pasquotank, Perquimans, eastern Bertie, southeastern Hertford, southeastern Gates and Chowan Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 320 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harrellsville to near Plymouth. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibilty and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Hertford, Winfall, Ryland, Powellsville, Colerain, Harrellsville, Cape Colony, Tyner, Snug Harbor, Hobbsville, Belvidere, Rockyhock, Valhalla, Midway, Askewville, Goose Pond, Whites Crossroads, Newsome Store and Arrowhead Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern North Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Bertie; Chowan; Gates; Hertford; Pasquotank; Perquimans
